thread.title: Unbuttoned: Should Fashion Be Politically Correct?
thread.title_full: Unbuttoned: Should Fashion Be Politically Correct?

title: Unbuttoned: Should Fashion Be Politically Correct?
text:
Published By: NYTimes Fashion - Today 
Designers risk offending when they comment on global issues via their shows. But fashion’s role is to reflect reality, even if it’s ugly...
